accessibility.text: Arbitrary redistribution: lenders lose real income, borrowers gain real income
Inflation Costs
Inflation
When past inflation is high and volatile it is difficult to guess
Arbitrary redistribution: lenders lose real income, borrowers gain real income
Inflation Costs
Inflation
When past inflation is high and volatile it is difficult to guess
If lenders guess inflation wrong (if they guess inflation to be lower than it turned out to be) they end up earning less (real) interest than agreed with the borrower
Arbitrary redistribution: lenders lose real income, borrowers gain real income
Inflation Costs
Inflation
When past inflation is high and volatile it is difficult to guess
If lenders guess inflation wrong (if they guess inflation to be lower than it turned out to be) they end up earning less (real) interest than agreed with the borrower
Borrowers end up paying less (real) interest than agreed with the lender
Arbitrary redistribution: lenders lose real income, borrowers gain real income
